title: Enchanting Kundan Polki Haaram with Ruby Centerpiece
materials: Natural Emeralds. Hyderabadi Kundan setting technique for a lustrous finish.
features: Floral motifs encrusted with uncut polki diamonds. Central pendant features a vibrant ruby, symbolizing prosperity. Delicate emerald accents punctuate the design, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The flexible setting allows for comfortable wear, and the intricate gold detailing showcases exceptional artistry.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white polki diamonds
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi or Diwali
and celebratory events. This Haaram will be the highlight of your bridal ensemble or add a touch of grandeur to any special occasion. Excellent for Seemantham
description: Timeless design blending traditional Kundan craftsmanship with modern sensibilities. The high-quality uncut polki diamonds exhibit exceptional brilliance. The use of genuine ruby and emeralds adds significant value and cultural significance. A perfect heirloom piece to cherish for generations.
